about.title: A collective of specialists delivering true turnkey projects
about.text: We are a team of narrowly focused professionals working under one roof. Each expert owns a dedicated domain: design, engineering, finishing, furnishing, smart systems, cleaning, and logistics. With years of handson experience, we operate as a perfectly coordinated unit: we design, build, equip, connect, clean, and hand over a movein ready space - just like checking into a hotel.

modal.error: Something went wrong, please try again.

item1.title: Integrated Technical Solutions
item1.text: Integrated construction & tech: HVAC, electrical, automation, interiors - no downtime.

item2.title: Transparent Process and Timelines
item2.text: A clear schedule, open communication and continuous quality control at every stage of the project.

item3.title: Long-Term Service
item3.text: We provide warranty and post-warranty service, regular maintenance and system optimisation.

faq.title: FAQ – frequently asked questions
faq.q1: What are the typical project timelines?
faq.a1: The schedule depends on the scope of the project. Smaller jobs usually take a few weeks, complex buildings several months. We always prepare a clear timeline and keep you updated on progress.
faq.q2: How do you deal with noise and dust during works?
faq.a2: We use modern equipment, coverings and extraction to minimise disruption. We also plan work phases so that the impact on people using the building is as small as possible.
faq.q3: What warranties and service do you provide?
faq.a3: We provide standard warranties on supplied equipment and installation works, and we also offer long-term service – regular maintenance, inspections and performance optimisation.
faq.q4: Can you join an already running project?
faq.a4: Yes, we can take over existing documentation and a project that is already under construction. We start with an audit of the current state and propose an optimal completion plan.

text.main: Breathe fresh, quiet, energyefficient air. We design and install central ventilation, airconditioning and heatrecoveryfor homes and commercial spaces. We finetune the system, choose lownoise units and set up smart control with CO₂/humiditybased scenarios.

card1.title: Analysis and Design
card1.item1: Audit and calculation of airflows for individual rooms.
card1.item2: HVAC design (routing, sizing, noise attenuation and system balancing).

card2.title: Supply and Installation
card2.item1: Selection and delivery of equipment (air handling units, fan coils, split units, heat recovery units).
card2.item2: Installation of ductwork and insulation, commissioning, measurement and balancing.

card3.title: Smart Control and Service
card3.item1: Integration with smart home systems (control by CO₂, humidity and temperature).
card3.item2: Service and regular professional maintenance for long-term reliable operation.

text.main: We design and install internal water and sewer systems, turnkey bathrooms, and leak protection. Quiet risers, proper slopes, pressure tests, and inspections.

card1.title: Design and Pipework
card1.item1: ZTI design (risers, routes, pipe sizing, slopes).

card2.title: Sewer and bathrooms
card2.item1: Sewer systems and acoustic insulation of risers.

benefits.title: Client benefits
benefits.item2: Stable water pressure in the system.
benefits.item4: Ready for future service and upgrades.

text.main: Power and lowvoltage done safe, scalable and neat. We deliver distribution boards, lighting design, outlets and appliance feeds, EV charging readiness, data/CCTV/alarm/entry systems and smart home integration.

card1.title: Design and Power Supply
card1.item2: Provision for future expansion and higher loads.

card2.title: Lighting and Socket Circuits
card2.item2: Power circuits: sockets and appliance connections.

card3.title: Low-Voltage and Smart Home
card3.item1: Low-voltage: data, Wi-Fi, CCTV and security.

design.title: Design & Architecture
design.subtitle: Elevate your space with Arctic - Prague’s premier interior design studio!

faq.title: FAQ - frequently asked questions
faq.q1: What happens during the first consultation?
faq.a1: First we listen to your needs, budget and preferred style. Then we prepare a proposal for the scope of work and an indicative schedule.
faq.q2: Do you work with existing furniture?
faq.a2: Yes, we can incorporate your existing furniture and complement it with new pieces so the space feels cohesive.
faq.q3: How do you handle budget for design and architecture?
faq.a3: We set the budget transparently in advance, prepare several options and keep you informed about any changes during the project.
faq.q4: Can you provide full turnkey implementation?
faq.a4: Yes, from concept and design through custom furniture, construction works and final styling. We take responsibility for the entire process.

1.title: Architectural Design
1.text: At Arctic Group, we don’t just create buildings - we bring your ideas to life in a clear, buildable form.

2.title: Comprehensive Project Management
2.text: We coordinate specialists, timelines and budget so you can stay focused on what matters most, without unnecessary stress.

text.main: We prepare complete design documentation for building technical systems - HVAC, plumbing and electrical installations. We take care of the concept, calculations, drawings and coordination with architecture and structural engineering.

card1.title: Concept & Feasibility Study
card1.item1: Analysis of the building and client requirements.

card3.title: Coordination & Author Supervision
card3.item1: Coordination of all trades with architecture.
card3.item2: Author supervision on site during construction.

cta.title: Get a Consultation for Your Project

text.main: We renovate apartments, houses and commercial spaces – from structural changes and technical installations to final interior details. We coordinate all trades, manage the schedule and hand over a clean space ready for use.

card1.title: Apartment & Commercial
card1.item1: Renovation of homes and small businesses.

card3.title: Commercial Spaces
card3.item1: Tailor-made fit-outs for offices and retail spaces.

benefits.title: Benefits for clients
benefits.item1: One Team For Design And Build.

text.main: We design and install façade insulation, building envelope repairs and insulation systems that improve the energy performance of the building and extend its lifespan. We carefully handle details, junctions and finishes so that the façade looks great and works reliably in the long term.

We connect all building systems into smart control - lighting, heating, cooling, HVAC, security and shading in one platform. We design scenes, mobile control and automation based on time, presence and sensor data.

card1.title: Smart Home And Scenes
card1.item1: Scenes and automation at the touch of a button.
card1.item2: Control lights, heating and audio from your phone.

card2.title: Technology Integration
card2.item1: Link all building systems into one smart solution.

card3.title: Security And Monitoring
card3.item2: Remote monitoring and alerts to your phone.

cta.title: Want Your Home To Think For You?

text.main: We represent the investor on site - controlling quality, schedule and budget. We monitor works against the design, standards and contract, highlight risks and ensure defects are removed before handover.

card1.title: Quality Control And Compliance
card1.item1: Regular inspections of the site and ongoing works.

card3.title: Handover And Documentation
card3.item1: Supervision of quality before final handover.

benefits.title: Benefits For Clients
benefits.item3: Fewer Risks, Errors And Future Claims.

1.title: Complete Turnkey Fit-Out
1.text: We handle the entire interior - construction works, finishes, furniture and technologies - so the space is ready to use immediately.

2.title: Trade and Contractor Coordination
2.text: We manage all trades, schedule and logistics to keep the work flowing smoothly, without delays or unnecessary stress for you.

3.title: Premium Materials and Details
3.text: We select quality materials and carefully resolve details, so the interior looks great, lasts long and is easy to maintain.

cta.title: Ready for a fit-out of your interior?

furniture.title: Design and Furniture Production
furniture.subtitle: Bespoke furniture design – from the first sketch to a finished piece in your interior.

1.title: Furniture Tailored to Your Space
1.text: We design furniture based on the actual space, layout and how you live – no compromises, everything made precisely for you.

2.title: Ergonomics and Everyday Functionality
2.text: We think about comfort, storage and the flow through the interior so the furniture works perfectly every day, not just looks good in photos.

3.title: Materials, Finishes and Details
3.text: We choose quality materials, finishes and hardware so your furniture lasts, is easy to maintain and fits the overall interior style.

turnkey.title: Turnkey Projects
turnkey.lede: From the first idea to handing over the keys - one team, one responsibility and a clear result. We take care of coordinating all trades, budget and schedule.

bullets.1: One partner for design, execution and technologies.
bullets.2: Transparent budget and a controlled schedule.
bullets.3: Minimal workload on your side - we handle details and coordination for you.
bullets.4: Stress-free moving - we’ll take care of logistics, movers, and final cleaning.

faq.title: FAQ – frequently asked questions
faq.q1: How long does a turnkey project take?
faq.a1: It depends on the scope – smaller interiors take weeks, larger projects several months. We always prepare a realistic schedule.
faq.q2: Can I be involved only in some phases?
faq.a2: Yes, together we set the level of your involvement – from a fully delegated project to detailed approval of individual steps.
faq.q3: How do you handle quality control?
faq.a3: We regularly check completed works, technologies and interior details. When needed, we propose adjustments already during implementation.
faq.q4: Can you work while the business is operating?
faq.a4: Yes, we plan projects to minimise disruption – by phasing works and scheduling evening or weekend shifts.

text.main: We revitalize apartment and townhouse buildings - from common areas to technical facilities. We provide design, permitting, and full implementation so that your building is safe, functional, and ready for the next decades.

card1.title: Common Areas
card1.item1: Renovation of entrances and common areas.
card1.item2: Upgrades of basements and outdoor spaces.
